Gabriel Renewing Eye Cream

Brand: Gabriel Cosmetics

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Aloe Vera Juice, Glycerin, Emulsifying Wax, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) (&) Maltodextrin, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Fucus Vesiculosus (Bladderwrack) Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract (Calendula) Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare Dulce Fennel Extract, Matricaria Recutita (Chamomile) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary)

(Bladderwrack) Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract (Calendula) Extract, Foeniculum Vulgare Dulce Fennel Extract, Matricaria Recutita (Chamomile) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) (&) Helianthus Annuus, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) (&) Maltodextrin, Xanthan Gum
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
